description: This file defines a 'Repository' class in Kotlin that acts as a data source layer for an Android TV frontend application. It provides methods to fetch content categories, content items, search results, content details, and live channels, utilizing both mock data and real API calls via Retrofit. The class dynamically configures its API base URL from system properties or environment variables, and includes methods for generating mock content and live channel data.

methods.name: getCategories
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches a list of content categories, either from the API service or mock data if API is unavailable.

methods.name: getContents
methods.description: Retrieves a list of content items filtered by category ID, using API if available or mock data otherwise.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a content search query, fetching from API or falling back to mock data.

methods.name: getContentDetails
methods.description: Fetches detailed information for a specific content item by ID, via API or mock data.

methods.name: getLiveChannels
methods.description: Retrieves a list of live TV channels from the API or mock data.

methods.name: mockCategories
methods.description: Generates a list of mock category data.

methods.name: mockContents
methods.description: Generates a list of mock content items.

methods.name: mockLive
methods.description: Generates a list of mock live channels.
